com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.checkpointstore.blob

Class BlobPartitionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.messaging.eventhubs.checkpointstore.blob.BlobPartitionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PartitionManager

    public class BlobPartitionManager
extends Object
implements PartitionManager
    Implementation of PartitionManager that uses Storage Blobs for persisting partition ownership and checkpoint information. EventProcessors can use this implementation to load balance and update checkpoints.
    See Also:
    EventProcessor

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlobPartitionManager(BlobContainerAsyncClient blobContainerAsyncClient)
      Creates an instance of BlobPartitionManager.

      This method is called by the EventProcessor to claim ownership of a list of partitions.
      Flux<PartitionOwnership> listOwnership(String eventHubName, String consumerGroupName)
      This method is called by the EventProcessor to get the list of all existing partition ownership from the Storage Blobs.
      Mono<String> updateCheckpoint(Checkpoint checkpoint)
      Updates the checkpoint in Storage Blobs for a partition.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlobPartitionManager

        public BlobPartitionManager(BlobContainerAsyncClient blobContainerAsyncClient)
        Creates an instance of BlobPartitionManager.
        Parameters:
        blobContainerAsyncClient - The BlobContainerAsyncClient this instance will use to read and update blobs in the storage container.

    • Method Detail

      • listOwnership

        public Flux<PartitionOwnership> listOwnership(String eventHubName,
                                              String consumerGroupName)
        This method is called by the EventProcessor to get the list of all existing partition ownership from the Storage Blobs. Could return empty results if there are is no existing ownership information.
        Specified by:
        listOwnership in interface PartitionManager
        Parameters:
        eventHubName - The Event Hub name to get ownership information.
        consumerGroupName - The consumer group name.
        Returns:
        A flux of partition ownership details of all the partitions that have/had an owner.

      • claimOwnership

        public Flux<PartitionOwnership> claimOwnership(PartitionOwnership... requestedPartitionOwnerships)
        This method is called by the EventProcessor to claim ownership of a list of partitions. This will return the list of partitions that were owned successfully.
        Specified by:
        claimOwnership in interface PartitionManager
        Parameters:
        requestedPartitionOwnerships - Array of partition ownerships this instance is requesting to own.
        Returns:
        A flux of partitions this instance successfully claimed ownership.

      • updateCheckpoint

        public Mono<String> updateCheckpoint(Checkpoint checkpoint)
        Updates the checkpoint in Storage Blobs for a partition.
        Specified by:
        updateCheckpoint in interface PartitionManager
        Parameters:
        checkpoint - Checkpoint information containing sequence number and offset to be stored for this partition.
        Returns:
        The new ETag on successful update.
